summary: A private detective investigates her sister's suicide 16 years earlier.
cast: Angela Baraldi|Gigio Alberti|Claudia Zanella|Andrea Renzi|Elio Germano|Alessandra D'Elia|Stella Vordemann|Luigi Maria Burruano|Gennaro Diana|Daphne Fabbri|Giovanni Gatti|Ewa Krawczuk|Ferdinando Maddaloni|Ylenia Malti|Fabio Maltoni|Francesco Ragnelli|Chiara Romersa|Bebo Storti|Ludovica Trolese|Irene Turati
title: Quo Vadis, baby?
